thread.section_title: Hotel Victoire & Germain - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excelent 4 stars
thread.title_full: Excelent 4 stars - Review of Hotel Victoire & Germain, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: MichaelNag
title: Excelent 4 stars
text:
Great service, location, lobby, - (with Nespresso and Kusmi Tea), rooms, (even the regular one is ok for a couple); as for the Delux it is really spacious for a capital city.
Highly recommended.
internet access is available as well as umbrellas in case of you know what.
Room Tip: Fifth floor for regular rooms and second for deluxe. Soth street-facing See more room tips
